title: PDF Quiz Generator
metadataDescription: Generate quizzes from your PDFs using AI! Simply upload a PDF and get a quiz based on its content.
metadataKeywords: PDF, quiz, generator, hyperjump, technology, AI, quiz generator, quiz maker, quiz creator, quiz generator AI, quiz maker AI, quiz creator AI
upload: Upload a PDF to generate an interactive quiz based on its content.
dropYourPDFHere: Drop your PDF here or click to browse.
goodEffort: Good effort! You're on the right track.
notBad: Not bad, but there's room for improvement.
